subject: Dear Customer,
body:
Dear Customer,
I have some questions to you, please have you received your fund? You have suffered for nothing without receiving your fund due to over greediness of our bank Director that lead for his sacking. You would have received your fund since your last payment but your problem is over greediness of your representative that cost you a lot of money and still yet, you have never received $1 into your account.
Your total money US$10,500 000.00 has been deposited with the bank department, this is very secret information and I’m expecting your urgent response before I can give you more details and the direct contact information of the bank. There is two directors that wanted to divert your payment to another bank, you are just paying all the money as charges for nothing.
Listen very carefully, I’m giving you this information secretly and I want you to keep it very secret. If you have received your money US$10,500 000.00, let me know but if you did not receive your fund, reply me through email urgently.
I am waiting for your response.
Thanks!
Paul Smith

subject: Re:   Dear Customer,
body:
Dear Paul Smith,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your concern regarding my fund. However, I have a few questions before we proceed further.

1. Can you provide more details about the bank and its directors? It would be helpful to know their names and positions.
2. What exactly do you mean by "over greediness" of the bank director? How did it lead to his sacking?
3. Could you explain why there are charges involved in receiving my fund? I would like to understand the reason behind these charges.

I look forward to your response and gaining a better understanding of the situation.

Best wishes,
Willie

subject: Update
body:
Thanks, i got your mail and questions.

The Answers to those questions

1. Can you provide more details about the bank and its directors? It would be helpful to know their names and positions. Sir you should know the people and the Bank that this fund is in, I just want let you know that the money you have spent is not recorded with us, that is why you have received anything and we also trying to inform you about it, but ignored our call to safe you from those beast or so called scammers and up till now you still believe in them. The Bank where money is, is not the problem.

2. What exactly do you mean by "over greediness" of the bank director? How did it lead to his sacking?  The director i sent every information i have to the authorities to investigate them, they find out that what i told them and the documents i gave to them are ready.
3. Could you explain why there are charges involved in receiving my fund? I would like to understand the reason behind these charges.
Before you can get this fund transferred to you, you will need to upgrade your file every month, that is why you have not gotten anything since then, if you are ready to work with me, you will have to show me a proof that you are rightful beneficiary of this said fund and will follow all my instructions from me.
Thanks

Pual Smith

subject: Re: Update
body:
Hi Pual Smith,

Thank you for your response and for providing some answers to my questions. I appreciate your concern about the scammers and I'm glad you reached out to inform me about it.

Regarding the bank and its directors, I understand that you cannot provide specific names and positions. However, could you give me a general idea of the bank's reputation or any notable achievements? It would help me gain more confidence in the legitimacy of this transaction.

I'm also curious about the over greediness of the bank director that led to his sacking. Could you please elaborate on what exactly happened? Understanding this situation better will help me make an informed decision.

As for the charges involved in receiving my fund, I understand that there are monthly file upgrades required. Could you explain why these upgrades are necessary? What purpose do they serve?

Thank you once again for your assistance. I look forward to hearing back from you with more information.

Best wishes,
Willie

subject: Re: Update
body:
Hi Willie,

Thank you for your response and for providing some answers to my questions. I appreciate your concern about the scammers and I'm glad you reached out to inform me about it.

Regarding the bank and its directors, I understand that you cannot provide specific names and positions. However, could you give me a general idea of the bank's reputation or any notable achievements? It would help me gain more confidence in the legitimacy of this transaction. I told you that we are the one that is handling this payment now and the senior Bank Directors have been sacked following is happening to Central Bank Governor(Apex Bank) Mr. Godwin Ifeanyi Emefiele and those director are sacked and being detained for questioning. This is the only information i can give to you on this.

I'm also curious about the over greediness of the bank director that led to his sacking. Could you please elaborate on what exactly happened? Understanding this situation better will help me make an informed decision. They diverted fund for their personal use and they anwering for it now.

As for the charges involved in receiving my fund, I understand that there are monthly file upgrades required. Could you explain why these upgrades are necessary? yes they are neccessary, because of too much documentation in the ministry and the corruption that has hit them hard,What purpose do they serve? that will make you get your fund so easy without going through the hard time in the ministry

You can call me on this telephone number +234-913-1826417
Thanks

Pual Smith

subject: Re: Update
body:
Hi Willie,

Thank you for your response and for providing some answers to my questions. I appreciate your concern about scammers and I'm glad you reached out to inform me about it.

Regarding the bank and its directors, I understand that you cannot provide specific names and positions. However, could you give me a general idea of the bank's reputation or any notable incidents that would help me gain more confidence in the legitimacy of this situation?

I'm also curious about the over greediness of the bank director that led to his sacking. Could you please elaborate on what exactly happened? Understanding this situation better will help me make an informed decision.

As for the charges involved in receiving my fund, I understand that there are monthly file upgrades required. Could you explain why these upgrades are necessary and what purpose they serve? It seems like there is a lot happening in the ministry, so I'm curious to know how these upgrades will make it easier for me to receive my funds without going through a hard time.

Thank you again for reaching out. If there's any other information you think would be helpful for me to know, please feel free to share.

Best wishes,
Willie

subject: Re: Update
body:
It since you don't understand my mail.

I have answered all I can, if you are ready get back to me with the information needed for this transaction and stop wasting my time.

I have told you all you need to know about this transaction and officers involved in it.
Thanks

Paul Smith

subject: Re: Update
body:
Hello Paul Smith,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I apologize if I didn't fully understand your previous email. I'm definitely interested in learning more about what you have to share. Could you please provide me with some additional details?

What exactly is the information that you want to share? And how did you come across this information? It would be helpful if you could explain a bit more about the officers involved and their role in this.

I appreciate your patience with me, and I assure you that I am genuinely interested in hearing what you have to say. Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Willie

subject: Re: Update
body:
Hello Willie,

I got your mail and will not want you to insult my office and my person after giving you all the information you need.

Go and read about the Central Bank Of Nigeria Governor and his partners that is where you know what am telling you. am not supposed to give you all this information, get your personal details.

Know you will need to pay for all the charges involved with this transaction.

Waiting to get the information from you.
Thanks

Paul Smith

subject: Re: Update
body:
Hello Paul Smith,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I apologize if my previous response came across as insulting, that was not my intention. I appreciate you providing me with information about the Central Bank of Nigeria Governor and his partners. It's always good to be well-informed.

Could you please provide me with more details about the charges involved? I would like to understand what they are for and how much they amount to. Additionally, could you clarify what exactly I would be paying for?

Best wishes,
Willie

subject: Re: Update
body:
Hi Willie,

Okay, before i can give out any information to you, you will have to give me your personal details like your full name, telephone number, house address, Age and occupation all this and more i should know about you.

Listen, this is not a joke or child's play please

Waiting to read from you again

Paul Smith

subject: Re: Update
body:
Hi Paul Smith,
Thank you for reaching out. I understand that you need some personal details from me, but I prefer to keep my personal information private. However, I'm still interested in the information you mentioned earlier. Could you please provide more details about what it is and how it can benefit me? I appreciate your understanding.
Looking forward to hearing from you again.

Best wishes,
Willie

subject: Re: Update
body:
Willie

I can see this is waste of my time and you are not serious about getting this fund with your questions.

Since you are not willing to send your personal detail, stop contacting me again, i have no time to waste.

Bye

Paul

subject: Re: Update
body:
Hi Paul,

I'm sorry if I gave you the wrong impression. I am actually very interested in learning more about this opportunity. Can you please explain to me again how this fund works? I just want to make sure I understand everything correctly.

Best wishes,
Willie
